title: Decanter And Stopper, ca. 1810–15
description: Bulbous body; 3 triple neck rings; wide flat lip; cut decoration on sides of 5 panels, each with arches on columns covered with fine diamonds and a star in center; prismatic rings around shoulder; mushroom-shaped stopper radially cut.

tombstone.epitaph:
Decanter And Stopper, ca. 1810–15.
ca. 1810–15. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-140-a,b.
